products.title: LG Vortex
products.description:
The LG Vortex is a mid-cost smart phone. This phone runs on the Android 2.2 OS, which provides easy integration with all Google apps, favorites, and widgets. With seven customizable home screens, you can keep your favorite games and applications conveniently located. The 3.2 inch touchscreen of the Vortex features tempered glass and tactile feedback. This design makes for a fast and accurate response. You can hook up the Vortex to a PC desktop or laptop to access music and games, print pictures, and transfer contacts. This phone is also equipped with an HTML Web browsing feature. The Virtual QWERTY keyboard of the Vortex features Swype, which allows you to enter text with one continuous finger motion. The LG Vortex is DivX Certified (which means that you can play movies with DivX quality up to 320x240).

 

Features

  • Android 2.2
  • 7 customizable home screens
  • 3.2" external touchscreen
  • Bluetooth Connectivity 2.1 + EDR (Enhanced Data Rate)
  • HTML Web browsing
  • Virtual QWERTY Featuring Swype
  • DivX Certified
  • One-touch speakerphone
  • Verizon network
  • Bar design
  • Hearing Aid Compatible (M4-Rating)
  • CDMA technology
  • 1.9 GHz CDMA PCS, 800 MHz CDMA (Digital Dual-Band) data transmission
  • Dimensions: 4.47" x 2.32" x 0.52"
  • Weight: 4.4oz.
  • 262K color TFT, 320 x 480 pixel display
  • 1,500 mAh battery
  • Up to 450 min. usage time
  • Up to 500 hrs. standby time
  • Social network capabilities

pros.text: Slim and compact design fits in your pocket well

cons.text: Slower when compared to to premium smartphones on the market
Comes with Bing search and Bing Maps as opposed to Google
Impossible to remove some of the pre-installed apps and services
Does not have the best browser on it (no flash)
